Software Engineer & open source fan.

I am a Fullstack Developer at Merlin

I love interacting with new people, languages and frameworks. Software has the power to change the world. That's what I'm all about.

I love web development, with most of my time spent writing HTML, CSS, and Javascript. I also have a background in and working on the backend, writing Python and C++.

If you're interested in learning more about my work, check out my work to see what I've done and what I'm doing right now.
